inclusion.criterion: Currently married women within reproductive age group (15-49 years)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women with history of acne and mild hirsutism
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current pregnant women, breast feed women (till 6 months)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Intension to get pregnant within the next 12 months and husband is traveler
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of acne, mild hirsutism, and elevated testosterone levels. She also has a macroadenoma with no invasion.
